subproject.corporate outcome: Enhanced national capacity to use ICT for development as driver for pro-poor capacity development and institutional building
subproject.description:
The project is to support implementing activities of the Information Technology Institute aimed at providing the Egyptian Public and Private labor market with a pool of highly qualified IT professionals and entrepreneurs. 

The project is to focus on t the following key areas: 
•	Promoting innovation and entrepreneurship across ITI and private sector 
•	Enhancement of the employability skills of the youth and creation of new job opportunities
•	Enhancement of ITI international cooperation relations
subproject.title: Supporting ITI Activities
